text: The relationship between replica - based simulations and the maximum entropy formalism was clarified and mathematically proven in papers by Roux and Weare [ 10 ] and Cavalli et al .[ 11 ] , both of which demonstrated that a replica - based approach is equivalent to the maximum entropy solution .

The relationship between replica - based simulations and the maximum entropy formalism was clarified and mathematically proven in papers by Roux and Weare [ 10 ] and Cavalli et al .[ 11 ] , both of which demonstrated that a replica - based approach is equivalent to the maximum entropy solution .
